name: Agency Growth Consultant LLC
description:
Having started, scaled and sold a digital agency in NY, Kelly Campbell is an agency growth consultant helping established creative and tech agencies transform.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
For over 15 years, I brings the rare trifecta of keen creative and technical guidance, proven digital marketing and business development strategy, and a deep passion for social and environmental impact.
Working with creative agency leadership, I focuse on the 4 P's of growth: people, positioning, pipeline and profitability.
We might be a good fit for one another if you run an established, mid-level creative or tech agency ($2-30MM in annual revenue), are looking to scale, and are committed to investing in the transformation of your business.
Uniquely qualified and passionate, my experience in entrepreneurship, business development strategy, project management, branding, design, communications, digital marketing and web technology, makes me extraordinarily valuable and versatile. I have the breadth and depth of knowledge needed to quickly recognize gaps, collaborate on practical and cost-effective solutions, find the perfect resources, and support clients as they attain remarkable results.
READ MORE...
